name: Strangle-Mangle
description:
Strangle-Mangle is a sideways shooter for two players. A strangle vine has invaded the world of the tiny creatures who live on a shelf at the back of an old shed. The creatures love to play, and have turned controlling the vine into a game.

The game came from an idea to improve creativity. The question is "What if in a shooter game shooting your opponent not only doesn't injure them, but actually provides a benefit?"

In this game, your opponent can catch the projectiles and shoot them right back.
